item.title: Donation
item.description: Photo by Artem from Pexels Firstly, I greatly appreicate any donation that comes my way. If you send me proof of a donation I will personally give you my gratitude. I accept crypto donations only as of right now. Bitcoin: bc1q2n4pj6378zskm886zr4h3lurv2wxzhuru89u46 Monero: 86P8jrSuxjAD3bq3dcRsShMD2xZLGT5GkdzgbUeZZbat8e3CcXGf4BXi9P7xBvsz22VGXFCG6r1tx2L7p7TFwhjfVU2Cbfs Nano: nano_3x4pb3zq4uowckjd55nd4na8ahw7w5au8amgoq1oxx3m5cpfzz6k94j75qxk

item.title: About
item.description: Photo by Axel Grollemund Who Am I? I am Gabriel Baughman of course. While true I am also someone who likes to write about a lot of topics. These topics can vary from technology to politics to guides, to online privacy. You can reach me via email, and find me on github. I plan to write whenever I can because there are things I believe that should be known and I will make sure they are.

item.title: Building gabrielbaughman.xyz
item.description: This is how I went about creating gabrielbaughman.xyz and how you can do the same.
